body:
Work in progress. 
- ~~one missing dependency: qtkeychain (not sure if this is a critical dependency)~~
- ~~dependency Qscintilla doesn't yet compile with newer versions of pyqt@4.12.1:, py-pyqt needs to be compiled with a private SIP module~~
- ~~dependency QCA requires a newer version (2.2.1) to compile with Qt@5.11.3, also needs to be compiled with CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD=11~~
title: New package: QGIS
